Card.title: Ron, Youngest Brother
Card.description: Ron, Youngest Brother If you have no cards in your hand, you may use an action to draw 5 cards.

Card.title: The Famous Harry Potter
Card.description: The Famous Harry Potter Before each of your turns, if there are 4 or fewer cards in your hand, you may draw a card.

Card.title: Hermione Granger
Card.description: Hermione Granger If you already have 2 or more lessons in play, then whenever you use an Action to play a lesson card, you may play 2 lesson cards instead of 1.

Card.title: Draco Malfoy, Slytherin
Card.description: Draco Malfoy, Slytherin Once during each of your turns, when you use an Action to play an Item card, you get 1 more Action that turn.

Card.title: Oliver Wood
Card.description: Oliver Wood Once per game, when 1 of your spell cards that needs Quidditch power does damage, you may have it do 8 more damage.

Card.title: Care of Magical Creatures
Card.description: Provides 1 Care of Magical Creatures Lesson

Card.title: Charms
Card.description: Provides 1 Charms Lesson

Card.title: Transfigurations
Card.description: Provides 1 Transfigurations Lesson

Card.title: Potions
Card.description: Provides 1 Potions Lesson

Card.title: Quidditch
Card.description: Provides 1 Quidditch Lesson

Card.title: Gryffindor Lion
Card.description: Griffindor Lion Damage: 3 Heath: 3

Card.title: Hufflepuff Badger
Card.description: Hufflepuff Badger Damage: 1 Heath: 3

Card.title: Ravenclaw Eagle
Card.description: Ravenclaw Eagle Damage: 2 Heath: 2

Card.title: Slytherin Serpent
Card.description: Slytherin Serpent Damage: 3 Heath: 1

Card.title: Baby Dragon
Card.description: Baby Dragon To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures lessons from play. Damage: 3 Heath: 5

Card.title: Welsh Green Dragon
Card.description: Welsh Green Dragon To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures lessons from play. When you play this card, do 6 damage to your opponent Damage: 6 Heath: 4

Card.title: Hebridean Black Dragon
Card.description: Hebridean Black Dragon To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures lessons from play. Damage: 7 Heath: 5

Card.title: Fluffy
Card.description: Fluffy To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures lessons from play. Damage: 12 Heath: 21

Card.title: Hedwig
Card.description: Hedwig When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing card from your discard pile into your hand. Damage: 1 Heath: 2

Card.title: Accio
Card.description: Accio Put up to 2 Lesson cards from your discard pile into your hand.

Card.title: Wingardium Leviosa
Card.description: Wingardium Leviosa During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Creatures.

Card.title: Wand Shop
Card.description: Wand Shop All Charms Lessons (yours and your opponent's) provide 2 instead of 1.

Card.title: Verdillious
Card.description: Verdillious Do 5 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

Card.title: Freezing Charm
Card.description: Freezing Charm Do 4 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

Card.title: Hover Charm
Card.description: Hover Charm Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play and return it to his or her hand.

Card.title: Reparo
Card.description: Reparo Put a non-Healing card from your discard pile into your hand.

Card.title: Backfire!
Card.description: Backfire! Do 5 damage to your opponent.

Card.title: Obliviate
Card.description: Obliviate Your oppoent discards his or her hand.

Card.title: Homework
Card.description: Homework Put up to 2 lesson cards from your hand into play.

Card.title: Transfiguration Exam
Card.description: Transfiguration Exam Discard all creatures from play (even your own).

Card.title: Aparecium
Card.description: Aparecium Show your hand to your opponent. Put all lesson cards there into play.

Card.title: Beetle Buttons
Card.description: Beetle Buttons Choose one of your opponent's creatures in play and discard it.

Card.title: Dobby's Disappearance
Card.description: Dobby's Disappearance Choose one of your opponent's cards in play and return it to his or her hand. You get one more Action this turn.

Card.title: Invisible Ink
Card.description: Invisible Ink Choose up to 2 lessons in play and discard them.

Card.title: Diffindo
Card.description: Diffindo Choose one of your opponent's cards in play and discard it.

Card.title: Mice to Snuffboxes
Card.description: Mice to Snuffboxes Choose up to 2 creatures in play and return them to their owner's hands.

Card.title: Counter Curse
Card.description: Counter Curse Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in play and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.

Card.title: Potions Homework
Card.description: Potions Homework Your opponent takes damage until he or she discards a Lesson card from his or her deck.

Card.title: Potions Project
Card.description: Potions Project Your opponent takes damage until he or she discards a total of 2 Lesson cards from his or her deck.

Card.title: Potions Test
Card.description: Potions Test Your opponent takes damage until he or she discards a total of 3 Lesson cards from his or her deck.

Card.title: Hospital Dormitory
Card.description: Hospital Dormitory Each turn, each player may prevent up to 4 damage done to him or her (the damage may be prevented from one or more cards).

Card.title: Draught of Living Death
Card.description: Draught of Living Death To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 12 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

Card.title: Malevolent Mixture
Card.description: Malevolent Mixture To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 10 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

Card.title: Star Glass Salve
Card.description: Star Glass Salve To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 12 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

Card.title: Bruisewort Balm
Card.description: Bruisewort Balm Shuffle up to 5 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

Card.title: Butterfly Weed Balm
Card.description: Butterfly Weed Balm To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 9 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

Card.title: Loop-the-Loops
Card.description: Loop-the-Loops Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then draw 4 cards.

Card.title: Quidditch Pitch
Card.description: Quidditch Pitch Spell cards that need Quidditch Power (yours and your opponent's) need 2 less Power to play (you still need at least 1 Power that matches).

Card.title: Bludger Bop
Card.description: Bludger Bop Your opponent chooses 1 of his or her cards in play and discards it. Then, if he or she has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

Card.title: Roque Bludger
Card.description: Roque Bludger Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 3 damage.

Card.title: Sloth Grip
Card.description: Sloth Grip During your opponent's next turn, you may prevent all but the first 3 damage done to you.

Card.title: Catch The Snitch
Card.description: Catch The Snitch You win the current Match (you get the prize).

Card.title: Defence!
Card.description: Defence! During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you.

Card.title: Griffindor Match
Card.description: Griffindor Match To Win: Do 12 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. Prize: The winner gets 2 more Actions during his or her next turn.

Card.title: Slytherin Match
Card.description: Slytherin Match To Win: Do 15 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. Prize: The winner may shuffle up to 15 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile into his or her deck.
